title: [bug] wtf rito ?????
body:
I just recconected at  4 min mark. 
the surrender vote popped up and it surrender for it self like dafuck ???   {{item:3070}} 
MINE LP :((((((((((((((
I GUESS THATS WHY U DON'T PLAY NAUT TOP

replies.body:
I'm not entirely sure what the issue is.  If you were disconnected at the start of the game, players are allowed the option to remake until there is a first blood.  Since there weren't any kills, players voted to remake.  If you connected back after the vote has taken place, the vote will still go through and the game will end.

I hope this makes sense!  Let me know if you have any other questions!
Lol...read the patch notes bud.  If you dc'd and didn't reconnect until 4 minutes, your team voted for a remake.
